metadata.title: CVE-2024-41015 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ocfs2: add bounds checking to ocfs2_check_dir_entry()This adds sanity checks for ocfs2_dir_entry to make sure all members ofocfs2_dir_entry don't stray beyond valid memory region.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
